body_html:
I was faced with the same "ResourceExhaustedError" issue, so I changed the code as follows. I have 2GB of GPU memory, but I failed to run this simple code. I don't know how much memory should my video card has. Anyway, I changed the code to do not use the GPU and fix the issue.

...
config = tf.ConfigProto(
device_count = {'GPU':0}
)
sess = tf.Session(config=config)
...

I was faced with the same "ResourceExhaustedError" issue, so I changed the code as follows. I have 2GB of GPU memory, but I failed to run this simple code. I don't know how much memory should my video card has. Anyway, I changed the code to do not use the GPU and fix the issue.
...

sess = tf.Session(config=config)

body:
I was faced with the same "ResourceExhaustedError" issue, so I changed the code as follows. I have 2GB of GPU memory, but I failed to run this simple code. I don't know how much memory should my video card has. Anyway, I changed the code to do not use the GPU and fix the issue.

...
config = tf.ConfigProto(
	device_count = {'GPU':0}
)
sess = tf.Session(config=config)
...
